name: Pokémon Go Puzzle
description:
Pokemon Go Puzzle is a turn-based strategy game that beautifully combines the Pokémon Franchise with the innovative gameplay style of Hitman Go.

This game will challenge you to go through challenging puzzles in which you have to strategically navigate a fixed grid to avoid Pokémon that are effective against you. You will have to acquire new Pokémon that are effective against the Pokémon blocking the way to the finish. This game is the perfect opportunity to show off your knowledge about all the Pokémon types. Don’t worry, if you are new to the Pokémon franchise or still learning the type effectiveness, we have a help tool available when you get stuck.

You will encounter a carefully selected number of Pokémon, which includes fan-favorites like Pikachu and Squirtle, but also some lesser known Pokémon like Toucannon.
